sys_documentation.help: When editing a transaction, the Approving Official Division selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Approving Official Division field. When adding a new transaction, the selected approving official diviision will specify the Approving Official Division, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.hint: When editing a transaction, the Approving Official Division selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Approving Official Division field. When adding a new transaction, the selected approving official diviision will specify the Approving Official Division, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.label: Approving Official Division Lookup
